[![](http://conn8ct.com/imgs/logo.png)](http://conn8ct.com)

Hello,

As we recently launched some of our services, which are Shared/VPS Hosting ( and soon Dedicated/Colocation )  we would like to offer a few packages for free.

We are offering our first VPS package free for the first month:

**V-100**

- 1 CPU ( 3.14Ghz)
- 512MB RAM
- 5GB **SSD** Space
- 150GB Bandwidth
- 200Mbps Uplink
- Daily backups included

----------------
<del>$ 6/month</del> - $0/First month | [Get it Now](https://billing.conn8ct.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=8)

Make sure to use Promo code: 65WYE4Q3GG

If 512MB RAM is not enough for you, we can upgrade it to **1GB** for free. Just drop us a support ticket!

Grab this offer before all the free packages are out ;)
